SKT_FIRST.name: Dead Man's Party
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>65%</color> chance to reduce the targets' <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>65%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>65%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Fool's Paradise
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target. If the target is Earth element inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.\n대상이 지속성이라면 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。\n対象が地属性の場合、<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Changes to Single Attack\nGreatly increases damage\nIncreased Effectiveness + 2 turns
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 단일 공격으로 변경\n피해량 대폭 증가\n효과 적중 +2턴
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 単体攻撃に変更\nダメージ大幅UP\n効果命中+2ターン

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nRemoves Buffs ▶ Steals Buff
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n강화 해제 ▶ 강화 효과 강탈
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n強化効果を解除 ▶ 強化効果を奪う

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: No One Lives Forever
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color>, and <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Speed </color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Additionally, has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on Earth targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 감소시킵니다.\n추가로 지속성 대상에게는 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>회복 불가</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>と<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\n地属性の対象には<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>回復不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>약점 공략</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>弱点攻略</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
